div.span: Interactive career guide featuring multimedia interviews with real people in every career, in-depth occupational profiles and information on colleges
Your user name and password may be in all capitals. Call any office for more information or help with HAC.
Stop the Silence. Help End the Violence.

You can make your transcript requests online; without ever having to visit the school’s office! It’s simple, secure, and fast. If your college or university is not listed or if a fee will be assessed, please call us and we will send a paper version for free! Please allow up to three (3) business days during the school year, and seven (7) days during summer break, for all transcript requests.
